name: Shrimp, Broccoli, and Sun-dried Tomatoes Scampi with Angel Hair
author: J.W. Sloan
summary: A variation on shrimp scampi and pasta that includes broccoli and sun-dried tomatoes.
ingredients: ½ pound large shrimp - peeled and deveined
1 (6 ounce) jar sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, drained and chopped
directions: Put the heat on under the pasta pot full of water
In a large saute pan heat the oil from the drained sun-dried tomatoes
When butter is melted saute the garlic about 1 minute, add the sun-dried tomatoes, heat for about 1 minute
Cook until shrimp are done, about 5-8 minutes
When pasta water comes to a boil, toss in the broccoli florets
Drain and turn into large past bowl
Spoon shrimp mixture over pasta and serve
